content: faux cable rib socks by jen hansen http //knittinglikecrazy com a cuff down version of the faux cable socks i recently knitted these socks are quick to knit and look pretty impressive and the best part there is not a cable needle in sight just some clever stitches to make it look all cable-licious size women s foot size medium materials  2 balls of crystal palace panda wool yarn 46% bamboo/43% wool/11% nylon 170yards/50g ball  1 set of us size 2 2 75 mm dpns or size needed to obtain gauge  tapestry needle gauge pattern notes and abbreviations 8 stitches/inch in stockinette stitch dpn s double pointed needle s co cast on st s stitch es rs right side ws wrong side k knit p purl k1tbl knit one stitch through the back loop sl1 slip one stitch purlwise ssk slip slip knit p2tog purl 2 stitches together faux cable rib socks version 1 1 // page 1 of 3 faux cable pattern over 32 stitches round 1 k3 p2 k2 k2tog k2 yo x 3 p2 k3 round 2 k3 p2 k5 k1tbl x 3 p2 k3 round 3 k3 p2 k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 x 3 p2 k3 round 4 k3 p2 k4 k1tbl k1 x 3 p2 k3 round 5 k3 p2 k2tog k2 yo k2 x 3 p2 k3 round 6 k3 p2 k3 k1tbl k2 x 3 p2 k3 rounds 7-10 k3 p2 k6 x 3 p2 k3 pattern cuff co 64 sts join round being careful not to twist divide the stitches over three needles as follows needle 1 16 sts needle 2 32 sts needle 3 16 sts work k2 p2 ribbing for about 1 5 inches continue to leg leg for needles 1 and 3 every round on the leg will be knit the pattern will run down the front of the leg and onto the foot for needle 2 use the faux cable pattern described above repeat rounds 1-10 three times and then repeat rounds 1-9 or until you have desired length for leg ending on row 9 heel flap knit the sts on needle 1 heel will be worked back and forth on needles 1 & 3 32 sts total row 1 ws sl1 p31 row 2 rs sl1 k1 x 16 faux cable rib socks version 1 1 // page 2 of 3 repeat these two row until you have 2 5 or desired length of heel flap ending with a wrong side row continue to heel turn heel turn row 1 rs sl1 k18 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 knit to 1 stitch before the gap ssk over the gap k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 purl to 1 stitch before the gap p2tog over the gap p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until all sts have been worked 20 sts remain continue to gusset gusset knit the stitches on the turned heel
